19 1 13 1 92 881 1511 1088 1535 zero-dimensional,
19 1 13 2 83 1101 1512 1135 1530 i.e.

33 1 1 9 93 1461 1750 1464 1758 ,

33 1 1 11 96 1514 1733 1560 1753 first
33 1 2 1 96 881 1766 993 1785 introduce
33 1 2 2 96 1006 1766 1043 1785 the
33 1 2 3 96 1055 1766 1140 1791 general

33 1 2 7 94 1376 1766 1439 1785 work:

33 1 3 1 96 881 1797 1021 1817 fluctuations
33 1 3 2 96 1036 1805 1071 1817 are

33 1 3 4 96 1127 1799 1259 1823 interesting,
33 1 3 5 93 1275 1798 1453 1823 experimentally
33 1 3 6 92 1467 1805 1560 1817 measur-
33 1 4 1 96 882 1830 929 1849 able

33 1 4 3 95 1064 1830 1113 1849 that
33 1 4 4 95 1128 1830 1190 1855 bring

33 1 4 7 93 1400 1830 1438 1849 the

33 1 5 1 96 881 1864 940 1881 ment

33 1 5 3 96 1065 1862 1107 1881 and

33 1 5 5 95 1242 1861 1266 1881 of

33 1 5 10 96 1508 1862 1561 1881 then
33 1 6 1 95 881 1894 993 1913 introduce
